name: Fish Out Of Water | Game off 2022
name_original: Fish Out Of Water | Game off 2022
description:
This was made for Github's 2022 Game off. Using the cliché, a fish out of water, a platformer/puzzle game was created. The game is about a fish trying to escape the sharks lair and get back to the ocean. Remember to drink as much water as you can, cause when the water meter goes to 0, you will perish. 

Github Version -> https://github.com/CornerstoneGames/FishOutOfWater
